title: 'Khejri Bachao Andolan': Why Rajasthan is rallying to protect its 'Kalpavriksha'?
description: A significant protest is under way in Rajasthan over the felling of the khejri tree. Communities are demanding stronger protection for the state tree, alleging that it is being cut to make way for solar power projects. Political leaders across parties have joined the movement, drawing attention to the tree’s cultural and ecological significance. In an arid landscape where survival is closely tied to ecology, the debate in western Rajasthan now extends beyond development to questions of history, identity and survival.

description: The BJP has nominated Ghatkopar corporator Ritu Tawde as its mayoral candidate for the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC). The Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena has named Sanjay Ghadi as their candidate for Deputy Mayor. The BJP-Shinde alliance, with 118 corporators, is confident of winning both posts.

title: Ola, Uber and other app-based taxi drivers to hold day-long strike – all you need to know
description: App-based transport workers nationwide protested on February 7, demanding fair incomes and protection against exploitation. Unions cited falling earnings and rising costs, urging governments to implement minimum base fares as mandated by 2025 guidelines. The strike highlighted concerns over unilateral pricing by platforms and financial burdens from device changes, with workers seeking statutory protections.

title: Exclusive: 'Until he plays Tests, he isn’t a big 'cricketer'—Sooryavanshi’s father
description: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi smoked 15 sixes and 15 fours at a strike rate of 218.75 during a brutal and breathtaking knock in the U-19 World Cup final against England at the Harare Sports Club in Zimbabwe. Back home in his village in Bihar’s Samastipur district, his family had hardly caught any sleep, while his coach’s phone in Patna was buzzing with congratulatory messages and strange requests: “Sir, mera beta do saal ka hai, usko cricketer Vaibhav bana dijiye (My son is two years old, make him like Vaibhav).”

title: Divya Shinde's first social media post, after BB Marathi 6 exit over threatening housemates

Her team has issued a statement, promising to share their side of the story soon, leaving fans eager for Divya's direct account.

The water contamination crisis has affected thousands in the area.

This challenge, though less severe, also impacts Tesla's recruitment in Texas, contrasting with easier relocations from California's job-rich areas.

title: ‘In 36 months, the cheapest place to put AI will be …’: Musk makes a bold prediction
description: Elon Musk predicts space will become the most cost-effective location for AI data centers within three years. He cited advantages like five times greater solar panel efficiency, no need for batteries due to constant sunlight, and the absence of atmospheric interference.
